main event: On July 17, 1964, in Berea, Ohio, multiple witnesses reported seeing a bright, luminous object hovering in the sky, which displayed erratic movements before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was described as being bright and pulsing, changing colors from white to yellow to orange., The object was estimated to be the size of a basketball and appeared close to the observers, about 200 yards away., Witnesses reported being intrigued and frightened by the sighting., Several neighbors attempted to observe and document the sighting, with one neighbor reportedly using a camera., No noise was associated with the object's movements, making it appear more unusual.
sighted object: a bright, luminous, pulsating object in the sky
witness description: a married couple who appeared calm and sincere in their observations
